explains: adj. 独立的；设备齐全的；沉默寡言的

sentences.en: Her family lives in a self-contained three-bedroom suite in the back of the main house.
sentences.cn: 她一家人住在主宅后面一个独立的三居室套房里。

sentences.en: Her father was a quiet self-contained man.
sentences.cn: 她父亲生前是个好静而独立自主的人。

sentences.en: Each chapter is self-contained and can be studied in isolation.
sentences.cn: 每一章均自成一篇，可单独学习。
